column4: 'there is no need' *IF* you want to mess with GRUB and 'manual' chainloading after the Windows installer nukes it out (hd0,0)
Ubuntu has a pretty good howto on dual boot -- the address should be in the bots here if anyone knows  the keyword(s)

technically panlin is correct, and with grubedit and modern howtos it became way easier to install M$FT O/Ses after Linux but now GRUB2 has thrown a wrinkle into things.  It's just easier...
